column5: Hey everyone i actually caught some fish at the local fishing hole this weekend 1 nice bass and 1 tiny one.  Both were caught on a 6'' dipstick worm texas rigged in about 5-7 FOW      And a couple pics of the area i was fishing    ive found the fishing here pretty tough as of late, maybe ill get lucky next weekend as well
Looks exactly like where we were fishing on the weekend.   Text book bass fishing area....but where the hell are all the fish?? lol
I think the problem is that the bass don't read the text book. We casted our behinds of in water that looked the same last week and came up with nothing. Jim
I guess this is where the phrase a bad day on the water beats a good day at work....I am currently at work living proof of that statement!
Don't give up, I'm sure there are some biguns' under that slop. thanks for the report, nice job!  Dirk
Good job Fins and Skins Keep at it... your local fishing hole looks prime for them bassin!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
yeah i know there in there i have caught some monsters out of there before, buggers just dont want to bite
Looks like prime topwater frog, popper, buzzbait territory to me!
